name: Richard Leo Blanco
text: Yes he is. And so is Miriam, if it comes down to that. But both have spent most of their time away, so it's Duterte the people here feel can really represent them. Ewan. I'm hoping that if he does win, at least some influential supporters will keep him in check.

source_obj.text: Yes he is. And so is Miriam, if it comes down to that. But both have spent most of their time away, so it's Duterte the people here feel can really represent them. Ewan. I'm hoping that if he does win, at least some influential supporters will keep him in check.
